StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetLeadByQSN]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @QSN_ID uniqueiden..er ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT L.[LeadID], L.[RecruitID], L.[DateStartedWorking], L.[PayGradeID], L.[DOR], L.[PrimaryMOSID], L.[AddtlMOSID1], L.[AddtlMOSID2], L.[PresentRUCID], L.[DateRECC], L.[DateEndAc.veService], L.[MCC], L.[ReserveRUCID], L.[MaritalStatusID], L.[NumberDependents], L.[CompositeScore], L.[DrawCaseCode], L.[ConductAvgService], L.[Pro.ciencyAvgService], L.[ReEnlistmentCode], L.[DateCRCRCer..ca.on], L.[SatYears], L.[DateEnteredArmedForces], L.[DatePayEntryBase], L.[DateArmedForcesAc.veDutyBase], L.[DateHIVScreen], L.[DateMostCurrentPHA], L.[DateMostCurrentPhysical], L.[Separa.onCode], L.[DateProjectedJoin], L.[NWARequestTypeID], L.[MarkedUnworkable_UserID], L.[MarkedUnworkable_Date], L.[Veri.edUnworkable_UserID], L.[Veri.edUnworkable_Date], L.[NWARequested_UserID], L.[NWARequested_Date], L.[NWAApproved_UserID], L.[NWAApproved_Date], L.[AssignedRecruiterID], L.[DateAssigned], L.[Gender], LP.[PrimaryPhone], LP.[SecondaryPhone], LP.[Ter.aryPhone], LP.[NOK1], LP.[NOK2], L.[AtachedPSRSSID], L.[ComponentCode], L.[ReserveComponentCode], L.[ErroneousJoin], L.[TotalRe.rementPoints] FROM [dbo].[Lead] L LEFT JOIN [dbo].[LeadPhones] LP ON L.LeadID = LP.LeadID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[ApplicantPackage] AP ON L.LeadID = AP.LeadID WHERE AP.[QSNID] = @QSN_ID
